scripts.dev: npx concurrently "cd server && yarn dev" "cd client && yarn dev"
scripts.fetch-changes: git fetch && git fetch --prune && git pull
scripts.ci: yarn --cwd ./client build && yarn --cwd ./client test && yarn --cwd ./client lint
scripts.clear: npx rimraf node_modules && cd server && npx rimraf node_modules && cd .. && cd client && npx rimraf node_modules build
